Verses: 1 en Kangalode Udanpadikkaipannina Naan Oru Kannigaiyinmel Ninaippaayiruppadheppadi?
2 appozhudhu Unnadhangalilirundhu Dhevan Alikkum Pangum, Unnadhaththilirundhu Sarvavallavar Kodukkum Sudhandharamum Kidaikkumo?
3 maarubaadaanavanukku Aabaththum, Akkirama Seygaikkaararukku Aakkinaiyumallavo Kidaikkum.
4 avar En Vazhigalaip Paarththu, En Nadaigalaiyellaam Ennugiraar Allavo?
5 naan Maayaiyile Nadandheno, En Kaal Kabaduseyyath Theeviriththadho Endru,
6 sumuththiraiyaana Tharaasile Dhevan Ennai Niruththu, En Uththamaththai Arivaaraaga.
7 en Nadaigal Vazhiyaivittu Vilaginadhum, En Irudhayam En Kangalaip Pinthodarndhadhum, Edhaagilum Oru Maasu En Kaigalil Ottikkondadhum Undaanaal,
8 appozhudhu Naan Vidhaiththadhai Veroruvan Pusippaanaaga; En Payirgal Veratruppogakkadavadhu.
9 en Manam Yaadhoru Sthreeyinmel Mayangi, Ayalaanudaiya Vaasalai Naan Ettippaarththadhundaanaal,
10 appozhudhu En Manaivi Veroruvanukku Maavaraippaalaaga; Vetrumanidhar Avalmel Saaivaargalaaga.
11 adhu Dhosham, Adhu Nyaayaadhipadhigalaal Visaarikkappadum Akkiramamaame.
12 adhu Paadhaalapariyandham Patchikkum Akkiniyaai En Sambaththaiyellaam Nirmoolamaakkum.
13 en Velaikkaaranaanaalum, En Velaikkaariyaanaalum, Ennodu Vazhakkaadumpodhu, Avargal Nyaayaththai Naan Asattaipanniyirundhaal,
14 dhevan Ezhumbumpodhu, Naan Enna Seyven; Avar Visaarikkumpodhu, Naan Avarukku Enna Maruuththaravu Solluven.
15 thaayin Karppaththil Ennai Undupanninavar Avalaiyum Undupanninaar Allavo? Orevidhamaana Karppaththile Engalai Uruvaakkinaar Allavo?
16 eliyavargal Vaanjiththadhai Naan Kodaadhirundhu, Vidhavaiyin Kangalaip Pooththuppogappanni,
17 thaaithagappanillaadha Pillai En Aagaaraththil Saappidaamal, Naan Oruvanaai Saappittadhundo?
18 en Siruvayadhumudhal Avan Thagappanidaththil Valarvadhupola Ennode Valarndhaan; Naan En Thaayin Karppaththile Pirandhadhumudhal Appadippattavargalaik Kailaagukoduththu Nadaththinen.
19 oruvan Uduppillaadhadhinaal Madindhupogiradhaiyum, Ezhaikku Mooda Vasthiramillaadhirukkiradhaiyum Naan Kandapodhu,
20 avan En Aattumayir Kambaliyinaale Analkondadhinaal, Avan Idai Ennaip Pugazhaadhirundhadhum,
21 olimugavaasalil Enakku Selvaakku Undendru Naan Kandu, Thikkatravanukku Virodhamaai En Kaiyai Neettinadhum Undaanaal,
22 en Kaippattai Tholilirundhu Sarindhu, En Buyaththu Elumbu Murindhupovadhaaga.
23 dhevan Aakkinaiyiduvaar Endrum, Avarudaiya Magaththuvaththai Uththarikkak Koodaadhu Endrum, Enakku Bayangaramaayirundhadhu.
24 naan Ponninmel En Nambikkaiyai Vaiththu, Thangaththaippaarththu: Nee En Aadharavu Endru Naan Sonnadhum,
25 en Aasthiperiyadhendrum, En Kaikku Migudhiyum Kidaiththadhendrum Naan Magizhndhadhum,
26 sooriyan Pragaasikkumpodhum, Alladhu Sandhiran Magimaiyaai Sellumpodhum, Naan Adhai Nokki:
27 en Manam Ragasiyamaai Mayakkappattu, En Vaai En Kaiyai Muththi Seydhadhundaanaal,
28 idhuvum Nyaayaadhipadhigalaal Visaarikkappadaththakka Akkiramamaayirukkum; Adhinaal Unnadhaththi
